snippet: The company's quarterly earnings conference call on Tuesday gave its chief executive a chance to moderate his comments about a takeover of the company by Liberty Media, which is run by John Malone.
abstract: The company's quarterly earnings conference call on Tuesday gave its chief executive a chance to moderate his comments about a takeover of the company by Liberty Media, which is run by John Malone.

headline.main: Karmazin Tones Down Language on Sirius Takeover
